languages.text: "Если ты говоришь о способности наших душ преодолевать трудности... Тогда испытанная боль действительно становится символом нашей непреходящей силы и внутреннего роста. И дает надежду на преодоление жизненных испытаний".

"If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."
languages.original_text: "Если ты говоришь о способности наших душ преодолевать трудности... Тогда испытанная боль действительно становится символом нашей непреходящей силы и внутреннего роста. И дает надежду на преодоление жизненных испытаний".

traits.locale_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

"If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

"If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

"If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

languages.text: «Si te refieres a la capacidad de nuestras almas para superar adversidades... entonces el sufrimiento que experimentamos sí se convierte en un símbolo de nuestra fortaleza y crecimiento interno. Y nos infunde esperanzas a la hora de afrontar las vicisitudes de la vida».
languages.original_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

traits.locale_text: «Si te refieres a la capacidad de nuestras almas para superar adversidades... entonces el sufrimiento que experimentamos sí se convierte en un símbolo de nuestra fortaleza y crecimiento interno. Y nos infunde esperanzas a la hora de afrontar las vicisitudes de la vida».

languages.text: 「私たちの魂が苦難を乗り越える力を持っているというなら…確かに苦難の経験は、私たちの確固たる強さと内なる成長の象徴とも言える。そして、人生の試練を乗り越えられるという希望を私に与えてくれる」
languages.original_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの魂が苦難を乗り越える力を持っているというなら…確かに苦難の経験は、私たちの確固たる強さと内なる成長の象徴とも言える。そして、人生の試練を乗り越えられるという希望を私に与えてくれる」

languages.text: “如果你指的是灵魂克服逆境的能力……我们遭受的磨难，确实会化作持久的力量与内在的成长。它赋予我们希望，战胜生活的种种试炼。”
languages.original_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

traits.locale_text: “如果你指的是灵魂克服逆境的能力……我们遭受的磨难，确实会化作持久的力量与内在的成长。它赋予我们希望，战胜生活的种种试炼。”

languages.text: « Si vous parlez de la possibilité pour nos âmes de surmonter l'adversité... alors l'expérience de la souffrance devient effectivement un symbole de notre force infrangible et de notre évolution intérieure. C'est en elle que nous pouvons puiser l'espoir de surmonter les épreuves de la vie. »
languages.original_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous parlez de la possibilité pour nos âmes de surmonter l'adversité... alors l'expérience de la souffrance devient effectivement un symbole de notre force infrangible et de notre évolution intérieure. C'est en elle que nous pouvons puiser l'espoir de surmonter les épreuves de la vie. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr von der Fähigkeit unserer Seelen sprecht, Leid zu überwinden ... dann werden Erfahrungen des Leids tatsächlich zum Symbol unserer beständigen Stärke und unseres inneren Wachstums. Und das gibt Hoffnung, dass wir die Prüfungen des Lebens bestehen können."
languages.original_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr von der Fähigkeit unserer Seelen sprecht, Leid zu überwinden ... dann werden Erfahrungen des Leids tatsächlich zum Symbol unserer beständigen Stärke und unseres inneren Wachstums. Und das gibt Hoffnung, dass wir die Prüfungen des Lebens bestehen können."

languages.text: "Ruhlarımızın zorlukların üstesinden gelme kabiliyetinden bahsediyorsan... Acı çekme deneyimi, sonsuz gücümüzün ve kişisel gelişimimizin bir sembolü hâline gelir. Hayatın imtihanlarını başarıyla tamamlayacağımıza dair bize ümit verir."
languages.original_text: "If you speak of our souls' ability to overcome hardship... then the experience of suffering does indeed become a symbol of our abiding strength and inner growth. And it gives hope that we can overcome life's trials."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhlarımızın zorlukların üstesinden gelme kabiliyetinden bahsediyorsan... Acı çekme deneyimi, sonsuz gücümüzün ve kişisel gelişimimizin bir sembolü hâline gelir. Hayatın imtihanlarını başarıyla tamamlayacağımıza dair bize ümit verir."
